gen:link.msg:message: `RemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectors` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_RemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_RemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectorsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectorsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectorsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingDirectorsFormerManagingDirectorsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
